staxel.village.character.dialogue.LeifRo: It's nice to finally be out of the ^c:1486b0;Tavern^c:pop;!
You can't really make yourself at home somewhere so public...
I can't express how thankful I am to ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop;!
Now that she's simplified the process of creating the transportation devices...
...I can visit my family whenever I want to!
Am I the same as the others in the village?
What could you possibly mean by that?
